content: Is there any sort of overview that shows how the different parts of mathlib depend on each other?
Yes! :smile: See the bottom of https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib_stats
Apologies if you were expecting a human-readable overview. I'm afraid imports are still so tangled that there is no reasonable answer to such a question
Exactly what I was looking for! Thank you
Oliver Soeser has marked this topic as resolved.
